alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marinette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:23PM CDT until May 13 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Florence County in northeastern Wisconsin... Northern Marinette County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 522 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Goodman, or 15 miles southwest of Kingsford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Homestead, Fern and Kingsford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
